entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
